name: Down Sheep
description:
Solve puzzles save sheep.

This was a submission to the 2020 Fall Lisp Game Jam

Controls
'WSAD' - Move
'SPACE' + 'GAP' + 'FEATHER' - Jump
'SPACE' + 'TREE' + 'AXE' - Cut
'n' - Switch Sheep
'm' - Mute
'p' - Pause
'q' - Screenshot
'Esc' - Return to the menu
'Enter' - Enter editor mode

Editor Controls
1 - Ground
2 - Fence
3 - Chasm
4 - Start | Finish
5 - Flowers (x6)
6 - Pads
7 - Heavy Pads
8 - Gates
9 - Axe | Weight | Feather
0 - Tree
[ - Previous brush
] - Next brush
. - Next level
p - Save
enter - switch to game mode
escape - open menu
